		                    Stage IV and Recurrent Renal Cell Cancer
		                    Treatment of stage IV and recurrent renal cell cancer may include the following:         -  Surgery (radical nephrectomy).    - Surgery (nephrectomy) to reduce the size of the tumor.    -  Targeted
